text: Geumarit teuma dua droe ureueng Lam kawan: jih nyan ureueng meutuah Takot keu Allah bandua gopnyan Nikmat keu gopnyan Neubri le Allah Geukheun tatamong laju bak pinto Awak nyan talo laju meunyerah Gata nyang meunang Neubri le Tuhan Tajok droe keunan ubak Potallah Tawakai gata bandum bak Tuhan Meunyo na iman gata keu Allah
